Control Name: 2.2 Develop configuration standards for all system components. Assure that these standards address all known security vulnerabilities and are consistent with industry-accepted system hardening standards.
Control Family: Build and Maintain a Secure Network and Systems

control_attributes.Goals: Build and Maintain a Secure Network and Systems
control_attributes.Control: 2.2 Develop configuration standards for all system components. Assure that these standards address all known security vulnerabilities and are consistent with industry-accepted system hardening standards.
control_attributes.Requirement: 2. Do not use vendor-supplied defaults for system passwords and other security parameters
